home.name: SaiManikanta
home.intro: A Strategic Software Engineer with above 4 years of industry experience and skilled in application development, testing and optimization. Excels at coordinating ground-up planning, programming, and implementation for core modules.Maintains strong object-oriented and software architecture fundamentals. Talented Software Developer equipped with great coding, debugging and project management abilities. Accomplishes project goals consistently with elegant, scalable code. Works great with team members under Agile and Scrum frameworks.

profile.name: SaiManikanta Karnati
profile.bio: Building, researching, and exploring technology fuels my days. Bridging tech, products, policy, philosophy, and life's big questions, I seek diverse perspectives through stimulating conversations.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: Experienced Software Development Engineer in Java, React, Angular, and advanced JavaScript, I'm deeply passionate about software development. I've played a key role in driving core functionality and features in both my current and previous roles. In my current project, the features I've implemented have resulted in a 15% increase in sales and enhanced customer satisfaction with the user experience. Additionally, I introduced caching techniques in the front end, reducing database calls by 20%, and implemented automation with Playwright, which led to a 45% reduction in bugs within the application.

workExperience.company: University of North Carolina At Charlotte

roles.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
roles.description: Led weekly discussion sections with over 40 graduate students, facilitating hands-on coding exercises and enhancing their understanding of algorithm design and data structures. Graded assignments and exams for 100+ students, providing detailed feedback on coding skills and algorithmic thinking, contributing to an overall 10% improvement in class performance. Developed supplementary instructional materials (problem sets, study guides, lecture notes), which were used by 95% of students in the course, enhancing learning retention. Collaborated with the professor to refine the curriculum, incorporating the latest research trends and technologies, leading to a 20% increase in student engagement.

roles.title: Associate Software Engineer
roles.description: Re-architected features using Pub-Sub models, boosting application performance by 20% and improving UI responsiveness. For the backend, I built REST APIs using Node.js and Express. Additionally, I utilized Design Patterns to create complex and robust application features. To enhance database performance, I optimized MongoDB queries by implementing indexes and using MongoDB Atlas Search, a cloud service, which led to a 10% increase in data retrieval speed and overall performance.

roles.title: Engineer Trainee
roles.description: Experienced team leader adept at overseeing React front-end projects and Java backend development with a small team during my internship. Proficient in guiding projects to success through collaborative efforts, strategic planning, and technical acumen, Participating in code reviews to ensure code quality, adherence to coding standards

education.institution: University of North Carolina At Charlotte

degrees.title: Master of Computer Science (MS)
degrees.description: As a current master's student in computer science in the United States, my perspective is a dynamic blend of academic immersion and professional ambition. Every day, I find myself deeply engaged in intricate coursework and learning cutting-edge technologies that not only expand my understanding of complex algorithms and programming languages but also fuel my passion for technological innovation. Beyond the confines of the classroom, I actively seek out networking opportunities, attending industry events and connecting with professionals to stay abreast of the latest advancements in technology. Balancing academic rigor with practical experiences, such as internships or co-op positions, allows me to bridge the gap between theory and real-world applications, reinforcing the relevance of my studies to address contemporary challenges. Despite the occasional challenges, my journey in computer science is driven by a profound desire to contribute meaningfully to the ever-evolving landscape of technology, knowing that each endeavor brings me closer to realizing my aspirations and making a lasting impact on the world.

degrees.title: Bachelor of Technology
degrees.description: Graduated with First Class with Distinction (CGPA: 7.73) in Computer Science & Engineering, specializing in data structures, algorithms, and Database technologies. Represented the college at national-level and qualified in Virtusa Codelite Hackathon. Awarded with a medal for the excellant performace in final year placements and academics

degrees.title: Intermediate Education (Higher Secondary)
degrees.description: Completed high schooling under the Board of Intermediate Education Andhra Pradesh with score of 970 of 1000.

education.institution: St. John's English Medium High School

degrees.title: SSC (Secondary School)
degrees.description: Completed secondary schooling with SSC curriculum, securing a notable score of 9.7 gpa of 10

interests.title: Software Development
interests.description: Driven by a passion for creating meaningful products, I have practical experience in developing websites, applications, backend services, and blockchain solutions using Solidity. I'm currently focused on enhancing my ability to craft clean, efficient software to deliver the best possible user experiences.

portfolioItems.title: SnapStore
portfolioItems.description: Snapstore is a fullstack web application where users can upload pictures, chat with friends, like,comment and save the posts, follow others and many more...

portfolioItems.title: Dapp-bookstore
portfolioItems.description: Dapp-bookstore is a blockchain (smart contracts) application implemented using solidity. It is a bookstore where we can sell books and add books through the ganache cli

portfolioItems.title: Snake Game
portfolioItems.description: Developed a classic Snake game where players navigate a growing snake to eat food and avoid collisions. The game emphasizes reflexes and strategy as players aim for the highest score.
